definition: to straighten/(fig.) to mend one's ways
to correct/to rectify/to redress/strong/brave/to pretend/to feign/affectation
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: Branches may be made straight, but not an old tree.
sentences.chinese: 嫩枝易矫直，老树难弯曲。

sentences.english: In this paper the finite element method is applied to analyze the web stress state of WCW I beam when it is straightened.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用有限元法分析了矫直时腹板的应力状态。

sentences.english: Therefor, a new on-line straightening guide and guard unit is developed.
sentences.chinese: 为此，研制了在线矫直导卫装置。

sentences.english: The plate roller straightener is the important equipment which guaranties the quality of the plate.
sentences.chinese: 矫直机是保证板带生产质量的关键设备。

sentences.english: Straightening roller straightening machine through the bars of pressure for them to change, such as straightness.
sentences.chinese: 矫直机通过矫直辊对棒材等进行挤压使其改变直线度。

sentences.english: Straightening roller straightening machine through the bars of pressure for them to change, such as straightness.
sentences.chinese: 矫直机通过矫直辊对棒材等进行挤压使其改变直线度。

sentences.english: The structure parameter calculations are studied on section straightener with parallel upper roll and below roll which they are arranged interleaving.
sentences.chinese: 研究了平行交错布置型钢辊式矫直机结构参数。

sentences.english: And a new drawing and bending straightening technology with micro tension is recommend in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中同时推荐了带微张力的拉伸弯曲矫直新工艺。

sentences.english: So improved Concast continuous straightening curve is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 给出了改进的康卡斯特连续矫直曲线。

sentences.english: Straightener is the key equipment which improves the product quality and the precision.
sentences.chinese: 矫直机是提高产品质量和精度的关键设备。

sentences.english: A type of roller structure straightener can resolve the problem well.
sentences.chinese: 一种结构简单的辊式矫直器能很好地解决这个问题。

sentences.english: The straightening effect of straightener can be improved along with the change of pitch.
sentences.chinese: 采用改变节距的方法，提高矫直机的矫直质量。

sentences.english: The straightening effect of straightener can be improved along with the change of pitch.
sentences.chinese: 采用改变节距的方法，提高矫直机的矫直质量。

sentences.english: The article describes the force analysis and performance.
sentences.chinese: 论述该矫直机的力能分析及性能特点。

sentences.english: Plus, if you want it really straight, use your straightening iron.
sentences.chinese: 另外，如果你想真的直，使用您的矫直铁。

sentences.english: Although expensive, this straightener is of professional standard and does a great job of straightening hair.
sentences.chinese: 虽然昂贵，这矫直是专业水平，并非常出色的直头发。
